page.title: 18Uyeasound Westside Shop.
page.content: The premises known as the Westside Shop are situated near by the harbour in Uyeasound.The present owner has had the shop for over 5 years.The hours of business are from 9.15 until 5.30 every day except Tuesday when the shop opens after the lunch break at 2.00 and Sunday when the shop opens from 4.30 to 6.00.The shop has two staff and it is a self-service shop. As well as general groceries,bread and greengroceries you can buy drapery,toys and hardware.The shop also has a 4 star petrol pump. In June 1985 petrol is Â£2.15 per gallon.Milk is 29p per pint,eggs Â£1 per dozen,250g butter 69p,100g jar of instant coffee Â£1.70,40 teabags 78p,1500g flour 62p,150g chocolate biscuits 59p and a large sliced loaf of white bread 50p.
